title._content: [Unidentified Virginia Military Institute cadet in uniform] (LOC)

description._content: [Unidentified Virginia Military Institute cadet in uniform] [ca. 1860] 1 photograph : quarter-plate ambrotype, hand-colored ; 12.5 x 10.1 cm (case) Notes: Title devised by Library staff. Case: Berg, no. 1-37. Deposit; Tom Liljenquist; 2012; (2010:105-5) Purchased from: Bill Turner, La Plata, Maryland, 2011. Forms part of: Liljenquist Family Collection of Civil War Photographs (Library of Congress). Forms part of: Ambrotype/Tintype photograph filing series (Library of Congress). Published in: Serrano, Domenick A. Still more Confederate faces. Bayside, N.Y.: Metropolitan Co., 1994, p. 131. Subjects: Virginia Military Institute--People--1860-1870. Students--1860-1870. Military uniforms--Confederate--1860-1870. United States--History--Civil War, 1861-1865--Confederate. Format: Portrait photographs--1860-1870. Ambrotypes--Hand-colored--1860-1870. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Part Of: Ambrotype/Tintype filing series (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650518 Liljenquist Family collection (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650519 More information about this collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.lilj Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsca.32595 Call Number: AMB/TIN no. 2850
